level.heading: Legislative history of Law 7-226
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-226, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 8-1001.

level.heading: Editor's notes
level.text: For present law, see Chapters 10B and 10C of this title.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of authority pursuant to D.C. Law 7-226, the “D.C. Solid Waste Management & Multi-Material Recycling Act of 1988”, see Mayor’s Order 89-160, July 20, 1989.
